info: after -masu base of verb; usu. 直す

english_definitions: to put back as it was
to get a better opinion of
to see in a more positive light
to get back on one's feet
taking a straight look at something
to put back on its feet
to make again (a plan, policy, etc.)

japanese.reading: たんとうちょくにゅう
たんとうちょくにゅう

english_definitions: to read (a book, etc.) over again
